title: Cardano Romania Community Knowledge
description: Cardano blockchain doesn't have content in Romania and community is struggling if they don't speak English very well

f6_assessments.q0: The creating of a knowledge base in Romanian will obviously add to the multilingual resources of Cardano. The key question however is,  how much will this increase non-English speakers involvement with Cardano. How big is the crypto community in Romania, how will you market to them, how many people do you expect this resource to draw in and over what time frames? What type of content do you expect to produce. Is this aimed at technical or non-technical users for instance?
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has the ability to create this type of resource. However the proposal is lacking in detail. How big will  the initial KB resource be, what will it contain and when will it be produced by. How long will the funding cover the production of one article per week for? How are you going to market this to the Romanian community to draw people in?
f6_assessments.q2: A more detailed set of deliverables and associated timelines is required for progress on this proposal to be audited. What would success look like for this project? It needs to be more than just production of the KB. How many users are you targeting, and over what time frames? Can you measure their engagement? How many will go onto become active contributors to Cardano or Project Catalyst (as proposers or CA's, or running a SPO for instance?).

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer identifies the problem of lack of content for the Romanian community and also the difficulty of access for non-English speakers. The proposer presents the solution of creating contents in romanian for the Community. It is not specified how much content will be produced or a deadline for carrying out the work. The proposer does not present a plan to keep the project sustainable after the Catalyst funding ends
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer does not show any evidence of his work and experience to implement the proposal. The number of team members that will implement the proposal is not specified. The budget is not detailed so it is not clear whether the requested budget is reasonable for the demand. The proposal doesn't offer a timetable to complete the work. The proposer gives a follow-up plan for the proposal but does not establish milestones or key metrics to evaluate the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer does not present a roadmap nor milestones throughout the development. It also lacks metrics or KPIs to enable proposal auditability. It would be important to contain this information in the proposal for a better evaluation.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal aims to create content in Romanian for the Cardano community in a wiki format. This challenge is very narrow in scope and the problem of creating multi-lingual content is for a very small subset of users.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no doubt that the proposer can effectively translate documentation to Romanian, but the plan is lacking specific on how to define success.
f6_assessments.q2: The ket performance indicator should be on the total number of documents translated and the total user count that accesses the Wiki, but these metrics are not included in the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea corresponds exactly to what the challenge seeks, because it intends to create a content library about the Cardano ecosystem for a population of Romania. It is said that a large part of the local population does not know how to speak English well, so certainly breaking the language barrier will make it easier for new members to arrive and act in our community, which is exactly what the challenge seeks.
f6_assessments.q1: Regarding the author, we have very little information. All we know is that he has many years of experience in the IT world and is also active in the cryptographic community. But we don't know important details such as: his name, his field of training, examples of previous work in the field he says he is involved in, how active he is in the community (does he participate in Catalyst? Does he hold? Does he participate in any pool). It would also be important for the author to show his intention to hire a team, other professionals to help him in the creation and maintenance of the page (wiki) created here. They would be designers, to create a simple and ergonomic interface, content creators themselves, people who had a deep understanding of the technologies of the Cardano ecosystem, advertisers who helped to promote the page, and so on. Therefore, it is necessary to retrieve this part of the proposal so that it is satisfactory, it is currently quite incomplete, unfortunately.
f6_assessments.q2: As in the previous comment, there is little detail regarding auditability. We know what the author (the team?) intends to do, which is basically to create this content platform related to Cardano in Romanian. And then, distribute that content to a list of interested parties. Right, but we would need to know, for example, how this platform would be created. About which pillars of the ecosystem the first contents would address, how this platform would be presented to the public, whether it would be through an application, a website, I don't know... It was also necessary to know who would be "interested", and how the content would reach them. It would also be important to establish other things such as: dates, to understand when each activity in a whole would happen; how would be the division of the money requested in the financing; which marketing plan; by what metrics the success of the proposal would be measured.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal was a great idea and has some massive potential, but there are some things to touch up on. There isn't really a plan or a timeline. There aren't much facts and they haven't explained their budget. They want to create content for the Romanian community to give them information about Cardano, if they want to achieve this they should add in some more detail of how they will attract people to the website, what they are going to do with the money and how they are going to hire people to publish the information.
f6_assessments.q1: Without a plan or timeline it is hard to execute this idea of making a Romanian Cardano information site.  There needs to be some more detail. The proposer is very experienced 15 years of experience coding and creating websites.
f6_assessments.q2: Timelines and reasoning for your budget are key aspects of easy auditing. Without these key items it makes it hard to audit success and progress. The idea of this Romanian information website was amazing but the planning needs a bit more work.

solution: Create content in romanian for romanian community in the form of a knowledge library i.e. wiki format
experience: Active on local tech and crypto community with 15+ years in co-creating value in the IT sector with expertise in cloud services and ISO27001
